Class HiddenCardPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardCollection
      • HiddenCardPool
  • public class HiddenCardPool
extends CardCollection
    This is just a hardcoded collection of cards hands are generated from For added fun, card ranks are randomly generated

    • Method Detail

      • generateCardPool

        public void generateCardPool()
        Creates a card pool from one of every type of monster "card name". Some cards are arbitrarily generated with more "high sides" than others. Works by iterating through card names, generating a card with that name and adding it to the hiddenCardPool, then shuffles it for when hands are dealt from this card pool.

      • generateCardRanks

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> generateCardRanks​(int highSides)
        Randomly generates 4 card ranks then shuffles them to distribute high rank edges
        Parameters:
        highSides - the amount of High rank sides of 4 to be generated (rank between 6-10) remaining sides are low ranks (rank between 1-5)

      • generateHighRank

        public int generateHighRank()
        Generates a rank integer from 6 - 10

      • generateLowRank

        public int generateLowRank()
        Generates a rank integer from 1 - 5
